name: User can see the detail page of each product -- @1.1

steps.name: Given I am logged in as a user with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
When I visit the inventory page
And I click on the product with name "Sauce Labs Backpack"

Then I should see the detail page of the product wit all its content and the correct product name "Sauce Labs Backpack", "$29.99", "carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection."

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.

fullName: Detail page functionallity test: User can see the detail page of each product
